metadata.title: CVE-2024-41311 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Libheif 1.17.6, insufficient checks in ImageOverlay::parse() decoding aheif file containing an overlay image with forged offsets can lead to anout-of-bounds read and write.

criterions.comment: libheif package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
